step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed as you begin the roll.
Nice movement! Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together and down.
Great job completing the first repetition! Remember to breathe deeply.
Second rep starting well. Ensure your shoulders stay down and back.
Excellent control! Continue to focus on the circular motion of your shoulder blades.
Fantastic finish to your second rep! You're doing great with mobility.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Keep up the good work on improving your shoulder mobility and supporting lymphatic flow.
